segments.advisor_message: So um, I just need to confirm your first name and um, last name for the records, could you tell me that?
segments.client_message: Sure, it's John Smith, that's J-O-H-N S-M-I-T-H.

segments.advisor_message: Got it, thanks. And, do you have a date of birth? Like when were you born?
Perfect! And um, where were you born? Just to get that information, you know?
segments.client_message: Oh, I was born in New York City.
